feed.title: Dockest Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Dockest news and events.

entry.title: An open source journey
entry.summary:
Assumptions with tags

Most developers probably don't worry too much about what GitHub tags are and/or and they work. By extension, most probably don't care too much about npm tags either. The common use case for using libraries is to simply yarn add dockest

// Most developers probably don't think about what tags are for in GitHub nor npm and simply go about their lives pushing code and downloading libraries simply by typing yarn add dockest.

However, thanks to my recent adventures in OSS, I've had to take a second look at tags - and here's what I learned!
